definitions.definition: A set of non-physical psychological and social qualities that make a person (or thing) distinct from another.
definitions.example: The president has a unique personality.

definitions.definition: An assumed role or manner of behavior.
definitions.example: In his final act, the comedian takes on a child's personality.
Johnny Carson was a respected television personality.

definitions.definition: Charisma, or qualities that make a person stand out from the crowd.
definitions.example: The best contestant shows most personality.

definitions.definition: Something said or written which refers to the person, conduct, etc., of some individual, especially something of a disparaging or offensive nature; personal remarks.
That quality of a law which concerns the condition, state, and capacity of persons.
